short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multi-Chain Support for BTC, ETH, BNB, NEAR & other Layer2 Networks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DeusWallet  - your dependable decentralized self-custody wallet.
Manage your digital assets effortlessly with DeusWallet, an open-source project that supports a wide array of blockchain networks while ensuring that your keys remain entirely under your control.

Key Features:

Multi-Chain Support: Access a wide array of blockchain networks.

Multi-Wallet (Multi-Account) Support: Create and manage as many accounts as you need. Utilize separate accounts for different Web3 projects to isolate contract risks.

Inbuilt Asset Swap: Seamlessly swap your assets to secure the best prices with minimal slippage.

Address Monitoring (Watch Addresses): Monitor the balances and transaction history of any public address.

Account History: Access and review your account's transaction history in detail.

Join the secure blockchain movement with Deus Walle and take control of your crypto assets with confidence today!
